markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Resounding Finale](/Feats.aspx?ID=4630) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=546" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 107 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[maestro muse](/Muses.aspx?ID=2)

**Trigger**
You or an ally benefiting from your composition spell would take sonic damage

</column>

---

You bring your performance to a sudden, dramatic finish, drowning out other sounds. Your composition spell ends immediately, and all allies that had been benefiting from the spell’s effects gain sonic resistance against the triggering damage equal to twice the composition spell’s rank.
name: Resounding Finale
